channel.title: [Class Suggestion] Puppeteer (Special)
channel.description:
(Under Construction)
**Puppeteer**-Blue Dragon Special-Converts to **Artisan** when converted to the unseen. Cannot be converted to the cult
Passive 1- Pulling the strings (**Puppeteer/Artisan**) If you are poisoned with Nightshade or recieve bleeding, It will transfer both into a puppet once.
Passive 2- Behind the scene (**Puppeteer**) Immune to target changing
Passive 3-Do you see me? (**Artisan**) Immune to death at night and role blocking
________________________
Ability 1-Woodwork (**Puppeteer/Artisan**)-Night You will have a wooden guard stand in front of your targets door. Only prevented by magic users. 3 Uses
Ability 2-Which is Which? (**Artisan**)-Night Make many puppets of the Unseen, confusing people who visits one of the coven, giving them the wrong results (as in they seem like a blue dragon). 2 Uses
Ability 3-Go search! (**Puppeteer**)-Night Send a puppet to look through people's room to find the cult/Unseen. If you find a cult/unseen, youll poison them, only having one day to be cured. 4 uses
____________________________
Ability 1-Strings (**Puppeteer/Artisan**)-Day Connect your mind with someone else, allowing you to talk for the rest of the day. Infinite uses
Ability 2-Tied Up(**Artisan**)-Day Forbid someone from using their day abilites by tying them up for the rest of the day. Infinite uses.
Ability 3-Jumpscared!(**Puppeteer**)-Day Cover someone's screen with a scare from your puppet for 15 seconds, disabling their day abilities as well as the chat until its over. 3 uses

item.title: [Class Suggestion] Puppeteer (Special)
item.dc:creator: Firekitten
item.description:
Was going to yell at u for mutiple passivea.

Then I saw you put names next to them

Read full topic

item.title: [Class Suggestion] Puppeteer (Special)
item.dc:creator: NOBLE1
item.description:
So like a mix between mystic and sheriff. Okay cool idea. Something I recommend is putting day and night in front of the abilities so it’s more strait forward.

Read full topic

item.title: [Class Suggestion] Puppeteer (Special)
item.dc:creator: Void_Magician
item.description:
(Under Construction)

Puppeteer-Blue Dragon Special-Converts to Artisan when converted to the unseen. Cannot be converted to the cult

Passive 1- Pulling the strings (Puppeteer/Artisan)
If you are poisoned with Nightshade or recieve bleeding, It will transfer both into a puppet once.

Passive 2- Behind the scene (Puppeteer)
Immune to target changing

Passive 3-Do you see me? (Artisan)
Immune to death at night and role blocking

Ability 1-Woodwork (Puppeteer/Artisan)-Night
You will have a wooden guard stand in front of your targets door. Only prevented by magic users. 3 Uses

Ability 2-Which is Which? (Artisan)-Night
Make many puppets of the Unseen, confusing people who visits one of the coven, giving them the wrong results (as in they seem like a blue dragon). 2 Uses

Ability 3-Go search! (Puppeteer)-Night
Send a puppet to look through people’s room to find the cult/Unseen. If you find a cult/unseen, youll poison them, only having one day to be cured. 4 uses

Ability 1-Strings (Puppeteer/Artisan)-Day
Connect your mind with someone else, allowing you to talk for the rest of the day. Infinite uses

Ability 2-Tied Up(Artisan)-Day
Forbid someone from using their day abilites by tying them up for the rest of the day. Infinite uses.

Ability 3-Jumpscared!(Puppeteer)-Day
Cover someone’s screen with a scare from your puppet for 15 seconds, disabling their day abilities as well as the chat until its over. 3 uses

Read full topic
